entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
